documents.document: Perfect location This is one of our best experiences at Timeshare resorts.Very good location, fast drive to best malls of Miami.Couple of minutes from the airport.The rooms are also very nice. Only that the second bedroom only has one bed. You have a great view of the golf course located at the resort.Everything is nearby. Publix, Walmart, Bestbuy, BJ are all less then 15 minutes away. Even Tigerdirect is close.
